query policyWanFirewallPolicyList ( $accountId:ID! $wanFirewallPolicyListInput:WanFirewallPolicyListInput!) {
	policy ( accountId:$accountId ) {
		wanFirewall {
			policyList ( input:$wanFirewallPolicyListInput   ) {
				items {
					id
					name
					description
					enabled
					policyLevel
					audit {
						publishedTime
						publishedBy
					}
				}
				paging {
					total
				}
			}
		}
	}	
}
